React-google-charts

A React Google Charts Wrapper

View project on GitHub

Installation 

  
                npm install react-google-charts

Usage 

  
var React = require('react');
var Chart = require('react-google-charts').Chart;

render: function() {

  <Chart chartType="LineChart" width={"600px"} height={"400px"} options = {
    {title : 'chart'}, data={ [
      ['column_one_label','column_two_label'], 
      [1,2], [2,3] ] } \>
  }
}

This page uses the Architect theme by Jason Long found on Github Pages
